column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As far as our seasoned eggs are concerned
column2: we flash boil our eggs before placing them in an ice bath
column3: after which they are marinated for approximately two days. This produces a "custard yolk" rather than a "runny yolk
column4: as you mention. For that preference, we always suggest substituting the seasoned egg for a poached egg, or Onsen Tamago" for ramen experts such as yourself.
